formattedAddress: 134 W 26th St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 134 W 26th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Outpost of a small chain selling treadmills, elliptical machines, exercise bikes & free weights.

originalText.text:
The quality of the merchandise this store sells is worth while for an investment.
The  warranty for the merchandise is good.
I give Hudson Steel products thumbs up for the fitness industry.

text.text:
The quality of the merchandise this store sells is worth while for an investment.
The  warranty for the merchandise is good.

originalText.text: Showroom has incorrectly assembled machines. The salesman/son of the owner is rude and disrespectful. Two days after I purchased their Chinese made machine they refused to stand by their product.

text.text: Showroom has incorrectly assembled machines. The salesman/son of the owner is rude and disrespectful. Two days after I purchased their Chinese made machine they refused to stand by their product.

originalText.text: I purchased a Spirit XT285 Treadmill and absolutely love it. David was incredibly helpful in helping me find a great treadmill in my price range. Delivery was on time and my broken treadmill was removed. I highly recommend Fitness Showrooms. Ask for David and I guarantee you will be happy with your experience.

text.text: I purchased a Spirit XT285 Treadmill and absolutely love it. David was incredibly helpful in helping me find a great treadmill in my price range. Delivery was on time and my broken treadmill was removed. I highly recommend Fitness Showrooms. Ask for David and I guarantee you will be happy with your experience.

originalText.text: David was a superb contact to have.  Quick, thorough, and on point.  He showed us around and offered us better alternatives for equipment we had planned on buying.  We were outfitting a small boutique style gym and David came to review the site and ensure that what he was suggesting to us was the best use of the space and would serve our gym enthusiasts appropriately.  The showroom had all types of equipment to test out and David made sure that he provided us with the most state of the art equipment for the price point we were looking to pay.  I would highly recommend anyone in NYC to visit this showroom and speak to David as he is a fully versed athlete familiar with the equipment.   No harsh sales.  Just a generally helpful guy looking to develop loyal clientele. Should we have another need we would not hesitate to return.

originalText.text:
It is always a good thing to say a kind word about a first time meeting with a salesman and the experience i encountered. I have never been into a Fitness showroom nor have i ever heard of this company before.
I needed an exercise bike and called them to make an appointment  just to browse.
I Meet David Briggs and  I knew right away, I was with a knowledgeable professional salesman. He was extremely respectful to my needs and guided me into the right product. He actually sold me much more then i wanted, but i felt great about and was not pressured.
In addition to the the bike he sold me a treadmill and a Body-craft universal and all the accessories that goes with it.
In addition  David sent me a rendering "art work" how my new equipment will look in my home. It was an amazing experience with "White Glove Service" I now know Fitness Showroom is the best place to go gym equipment!
Thank you David!!!!

Michael Adler
